Articles.Content: Hello everyone! I've been playing KSP for a while now, but this is actually my first time on the forums. I'm not the best at the game by any means (my only Mun landing was using RCS to escape the falling lander) and I don't claim to be. But, then again, where's the fun in not blowing stuff up!

Welcome to the forum, Capthenrysand. 

Nobody's missions work right every time. It doesn't mean you're bad at the game. Often, those missions make the most entertaining stories.

Nothing wrong with using bailing out of a lander on RCS. One day you'll bail out of a reentry pod mid-atmosphere (oh, look, forgot parachutes!), and then find out that the helmet is the strongest part of the Kerbal
